description: Designed with the outlaw spirit that forged the American west, the Renegade™ was built for a life of action. Soft yet extremely durable, Kuhls exclusive softshell fabric is quick dry with abrasion and water resistance. Superior stretch and our articulated patterning provide superior freedom of motion and the ideal fit. Maximum (UPF 50+) sun protection.
name: Kuhl Renegade Pants, 28" Inseam - Mens
